quotes.text: Allah ki madad sirf unke saath hai jo mehnat karte hain.
quotes.translation: Allah's help is only with those who work hard.

quotes.text: Sabr ka phal meetha hota hai.
quotes.translation: The fruit of patience is sweet.

quotes.text: Tu rozi ka nahi, niyat ka mohtaaj hai.
quotes.translation: You are not in need of sustenance, but of pure intention.

quotes.text: Nafs ko control karna asli jihad hai.
quotes.translation: Controlling the nafs (desires) is the real jihad.

quotes.text: Jitna Allah pe bharosa, utni hi taqat milti hai.
quotes.translation: The more you trust in Allah, the more strength you receive.

quotes.text: Shukar karne se barkat badhti hai.
Mehnat kar, taqdeer ka rona chhod.
quotes.translation: Work hard, stop complaining about destiny.

quotes.text: Kamzor nafs strong body se zyada khatarnak hai.
quotes.translation: A weak soul is more dangerous than a weak body.

quotes.text: Allah par tawakkul kar aur apna kaam kar.
quotes.translation: Trust in Allah and do your work.

quotes.text: Har musibat mein Allah ki hikmah chupi hai.
quotes.translation: In every difficulty lies Allah's wisdom.
